ruling: - [[Destiny End Dragoon]] cannot be Special Summoned from the Graveyard if it was not successfully Fusion Summoned before being sent to the Graveyard. For example, if [[Destiny End Dragoon]] is randomly sent to the Graveyard by [[Success Probability 0%]], it cannot be Special Summoned from the Graveyard.
- The damage inflicted with [[Destiny End Dragoon]]'s effect is equal to the current ATK of the destroyed monster on the field. If you destroy a face-down monster, 0 damage is inflicted.
